articles.author: CGTN
articles.title: Qin Haiyang, Yang Liwei announced flag bearers for Chinese Asian Games delegation - CGTN
articles.description: Swimmer Qin Haiyang and basketball player Yang Liwei were announced on Friday as the flag bearers of the Chinese delegation at the opening ceremony of the Hangzhou Asian Games.
articles.content: Swimmer Qin Haiyang and basketball player Yang Liwei were announced on Friday as the flag bearers of the Chinese delegation at the opening ceremony of the Hangzhou Asian Games.Qin, 24, emerged as a d… [+1167 chars]
